description: Create a basic NMOS transistor circuit with 1μm channel length, 10μm width, operating at 3V supply voltage. Include DC operating point analysis.
generated_code:
.MODEL nmos NMOS
+ LEVEL=1 VTO=0.7 KP=120u GAMMA=0.5 PHI=0.6
+ LAMBDA=0.1 RD=10 RS=10 CBD=5f CBS=5f
+ CGDO=0.4n CGSO=0.4n CGBO=0.4n
+ ANNO=NAME nmos

.TRAN 1n 1u
.PROBE DC I(VDD)
.END

description: Design a PMOS transistor circuit with 0.5μm gate length, 20μm width, 1.8V supply voltage, with body bias of -0.5V. Perform transient analysis with 1ns time steps for 100ns duration.
generated_code:
.MODEL pmos_rf PMOS(
+ LEVEL=1 VTO=-0.7 KP=50u GAMMA=0.5 PHI=0.6
+ LAMBDA=0.1 RD=15 RS=15 CBD=5f CBS=5f
+ CGDO=0.4n CGSO=0.4n CGBO=0.4n)

.TRAN 1n 1u
.PROBE DC I(VDD)
.END

description: Design a power MOSFET with 10μm channel length, 1000μm width, 20V drain voltage capability, and thick gate oxide (50nm). Analyze breakdown characteristics and safe operating area.
generated_code:
* 1. Comment line describing circuit
* 2. Device instances (M1, Q1, etc.) with proper node connections
* 3. Voltage/current sources (V1, I1, etc.)
* 4. .MODEL statements for device parameters
* 5. Analysis command (.DC, .AC, or .TRAN)
* 6. .PROBE measurement statements
* 7. .END

* 8. Example SPICE FORMAT TO FOLLOW
* 9. Design a power MOSFET with 10μm channel length, 1000μm width, 20V drain voltage capability, and thick gate oxide (50nm). Analyze breakdown characteristics and safe operating area.
M1 vd vg 0 0 nmos L=10u W=1000u
VDD vd 0 DC 20
VGS vg 0 DC 0
VSS 0 0 DC 0

.MODEL nmos NMOS(
+ LEVEL=1 VTO=0.7 KP=120u GAMMA=0.5 PHI=0.6
+ LAMBDA=0.1 RD=10 RS=10 CBD=5f CBS=5f
+ CGDO=0.4n CGSO=0.4n CGBO=0.4n)

.AC DEC 10 1K 10G
.PROBE DC I(VDD)
.END

description: Create a FinFET structure with 14nm technology node, tri-gate configuration, 0.8V supply voltage, and undoped channel. Perform noise analysis and mobility characterization.
generated_code:
* Create a FinFET structure with 14nm technology node, tri-gate configuration, 0.8V supply voltage, and undoped channel. Perform noise analysis and mobility characterization.
* M1 vd vg 0 0 nmos_rf L=1u W=10u
* VDD vd 0 DC 0.8
* VGS vg 0 DC 0
* VSS 0 0 DC 0

.MODEL nmos_rf NMOS(
+ LEVEL=1 VTO=0.7 KP=120u GAMMA=0.5 PHI=0.6
+ LAMBDA=0.1 RD=10 RS=10 CBD=5f CBS=5f
+ CGDO=0.4n CGSO=0.4n CGBO=0.4n)

.AC DEC 10 1K 10G
.PROBE DC I(VDD)
.END

.END

.PROBE DC V(vin)
.END

description: Design an NPN bipolar junction transistor with 0.5μm base width, 1e18 cm⁻³ base doping, 1e16 cm⁻³ collector doping. Analyze common-emitter characteristics and current gain (β) versus collector current.
generated_code:
.MODEL npn NPN
+ IS=1e-16 BF=100 BR=1 VAF=100 VAR=10
+ RB=10 RC=1 RE=0.5 CJE=0.5p CJC=0.3p
+ NODE_NAMES(0)=V1
+ NODE_NAMES(1)=Q1
+ NODE_NAMES(2)=R1
+ NODE_NAMES(3)=C1
+ NODE_NAMES(4)=L1
+ NODE_NAMES(5)=V1
+ NODE_NAMES(6)=I1
+ ANALYSIS(1)=DC I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ ANALYSIS(2)=AC I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ ANALYSIS(3)=TRAN I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ PROBE(1)=DC I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ PROBE(2)=AC I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ PROBE(3)=TRAN I(VCE) I(VBE)
+ END(1)

END
